install.name: Migration Backlinks
install.description: The Advanced Tools Menu table is used by the advanced tool module to build a menu

param.name: url
param.label: Base Link
param.description: The original link of the item

param.name: sefurl
param.label: SEF Link
param.description: The original SEF url of the item

param.name: newurl
param.label: New Link
param.description: A new URL to use instead of attempting to discover the right link
